H0.text: What is Brazil's most widely-spoken language. Spanish

H1.text: What is Brazil's most widely-spoken language. English

H2.text: What is Brazil's most widely-spoken language. French

H3.text: What is Brazil's most widely-spoken language. Portugese

A4.text: It is spoken by nearly all of the 203 million inhabitants of Brazil.

A5.text: The existence of Portuguese in Brazil is a legacy of the Portuguese colonization of the Americas.
